scripts.dev: ags quit 2>/dev/null; ags run --gtk 4 & inotifywait -m -r -e close_write . --exclude '(node_modules|.git|dist|build)' | while read -r directory events filename; do case "$filename" in *.ts|*.tsx|*.js|*.jsx|*.scss|*.css|*.json) echo "File changed: $filename"; ags quit 2>/dev/null; sleep 0.3; ags run --gtk 4 & ;; esac; done
